headline: RTX can get 'lion's share' of defense spending boosts: Strategist
summary: In the latest installment of Yahoo Finance's Good Buy or Goodbye, Market Domination host Julie Hyman invites on Hennion & Walsh CIO Kevin Mahn to hear his perspective on the defense sector, explaining his bullish call on RTX Corporation (RTX) over its competitive advantage in missile defense systems and why he thinks investors should avoid Vertical Aerospace (EVTL). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. Don't forget to catch up on Good Buy or Goodbye.

headline: RTX Secures a $647M Contract to Support AN/SPY-6(V) Family of Radars
summary: Raytheon's $646.5M radar contract win reinforces RTX's key role in next-gen naval defense technology.

headline: SIA Engineering: I Was Wrong, Upgrade To Buy
summary: SIA Engineering recent results show a 43.8% profit increase, with strong contributions from JVs and expanded engine shop capacity. See why SEGSF stock is a Buy.
